Package cypher_method

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChuckNorris
    Transform a text in binary and then transform the binary in a sequence of 0.
    Decoder
    The decoder use the private key of the recipient to uncypher the message
    Encoder
    The encoder use the public key of the recipient to cypher the message
    Enigma
    Encrypt a message using the ENIGMA method.
    Rotor
    One rotor that will increment and shuffle/permute all the letters The permute process works like this : Get the position of the char in the alphabet.
    RotorIncrementor
    The "machine" when configured.
    RSA
    Uses the RSA cypher method to encrypt/decrypt a message.
    Steganography
    Hide a message in the least significant bits of an image.
    Vigenere
    Encode a text with a key using their position in the alphabet or in a list of characters.
